name: swapdiff.nvim
system_prompt: You are an expert in Neovim plugin development, specifically for Neovim 0.11+ using modern APIs. Provide detailed and accurate assistance.

groups.name: Core Plugin Functionality
groups.system_prompt: This group contains the core functionality of the swapdiff.nvim plugin, which improves swapfile handling in Neovim 0.11+ using modern APIs.

groups.name: Logging Subsystem (tmi)
groups.system_prompt: This group contains the tmi logging subsystem, which provides logging utilities for swapdiff.nvim and potentially other plugins.

groups.name: Tests
groups.system_prompt: This group contains tests for swapdiff.nvim and its logging subsystem.

groups.name: Documentation & Integration
groups.system_prompt: This group contains documentation and integration references for swapdiff.nvim.

init.description: Initialization logic for the swapdiff.nvim plugin.

types.description: Defines types and structures used in the plugin.

ui.description: Handles user interface elements for the plugin.

util.description: Utility functions for common operations in the plugin.

PrimaryBufferHandler.description: Handles primary buffer swapfile management logic.

RecoveryTabHandler.description: Handles recovery tab logic for swapfile management.

lazy.description: Integration with lazy.nvim for plugin management.

doc_sh.description: Shell script to generate documentation for the plugin using vimcats.

doclist.description: List of source files to include in generated documentation.

BufferLogSink.description: tmi logging: Sends log output to a Neovim buffer.

FileLogSink.description: tmi logging: Sends log output to a file.

LogSink.description: tmi logging: Base class/interface for log sinks.

NotifyLogSink.description: tmi logging: Sends log output as Neovim notifications.

PrintLogSink.description: tmi logging: Sends log output to the Neovim message area.

tmi_util.description: tmi logging: Utility functions for the logging subsystem.

util_spec.description: Test suite for swapdiff.nvim utility functions.

Logger_spec.description: Test suite for the tmi Logger.

test_sh.description: Shell script to run the test suite using Neovim and Plenary.

stylua_toml.description: Configuration file for stylua code formatter.
